attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many things wrong with the child support agency. These Policies are seriously wrong and need addressing.
They should allow for all kids of the second family, not the first 3. [I have 5 what about them?]
Should not allow Tax credits factored in to assessment. [Mine are paid directly to my Wife anyway]
Should allow for 2nd family mortgage. 
Should not factor in overtime payments if taking leave. 
Should close habitually resident loophole. [My ex claimed from Bolivia?]
Should not rely on Child Benefit for Checks.The only check the CSA perform to find out if your child is in Full Time Education is to check if they receive child benefit. This is inadequate and the CSA should do it's own checking.
Should introduce regional assessment. [Why should someone living in London be assessed the same as someone in an area with cheaper house prices. This is serious because the PWC's mortgage is not factored into any assessment.]

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
